features.description: New Apple M1 Pro and M1 Max chips deliver incredible performance
Up to 21 hours of battery life,footnote¹ thanks to the efficiency of Apple silicon
Liquid Retina XDR display features extreme dynamic range and incredible contrast ratio
New 1080p FaceTime HD camera, high-fidelity six-speaker sound system, and studio-quality mic array
Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, SDXC, and MagSafe 3 for fast and versatile connectivity
New Apple M1 Pro and M1 Max chips deliver incredible performance
Up to 21 hours of battery life,footnote¹ thanks to the efficiency of Apple silicon
Liquid Retina XDR display features extreme dynamic range and incredible contrast ratio
New 1080p FaceTime HD camera, high-fidelity six-speaker sound system, and studio-quality mic array
Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, SDXC, and MagSafe 3 for fast and versatile connectivity
Get more done faster with the next-generation Apple M2 chip and an active cooling system that sustains pro levels of performance
Go all day and into the night with up to 20 hours of battery lifefootnote¹
Retina display with 500 nits of brightness delivers vibrant colors and incredible detail
Two Thunderbolt ports let you connect and power high-speed accessories
All-new strikingly thin design so you can work, play, or create just about anything — anywhere
Get more done faster with the next-generation Apple M2 chip — and go all day and into the night with up to 18 hours of battery life¹
13.6-inch Liquid Retina display with 500 nits of brightness makes text and images look brilliant, with vivid detailfootnote²
Everything looks sharp and sounds great with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, three-mic array, and four-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio
Fanless design means MacBook Air stays completely silent no matter how intense the task
Apple M1 chip delivers powerful CPU, GPU, and machine learning performance
Up to 18 hours of battery life so you can go longer than everFootnote1
Retina display with vibrant colors and incredible detail
Superfast SSD storage opens apps and files in an instant
Fanless design for silent operation
